remarks: Change the bound variable of restricted "at most one" using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
statement:
cbvral.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbvral.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbvral.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvrmo $p |- ( E* x e. A ph <-> E* y e. A ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
